org.jepria.catalina.authenticator.rcsso

Class RemoteCacheSingleSignOn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleBase
      • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleMBeanBase
        • org.apache.catalina.valves.ValveBase
          • org.apache.catalina.authenticator.SingleSignOn
            • org.jepria.catalina.authenticator.rcsso.RemoteCacheSingleSignOn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.management.MBeanRegistration, org.apache.catalina.Contained, org.apache.catalina.Lifecycle, org.apache.catalina.Valve

    public class RemoteCacheSingleSignOn
extends org.apache.catalina.authenticator.SingleSignOn
    A SingleSignOn Valve that caches authentication data on the web server. Can be declared as a regular Valve in server.xml with the following attributes:
  • webCacheServletUrl mandatory attribute, an URL of the web cache servlet
  • webCachePassword optional attribute, a password to authorize requests to the web cache, in case the server requires such authorization.
